name: Expertise in Longbow Crafting
description:
Use this expertise to craft a second-tier precursor.
<c=@flavor>Most informative.<c>

name: Chest of Quaggan Friendship
description: Contains the Essence of Quaggan Friendship and recipes for completing Rage.

name: Ruka's Weapon Recipe Book
description: Double-click to choose a recipe for crafting gear with the Wanderer's stat combination.

name: Gift of Insights
description: In the Mystic Forge, combine a Gift of Maguuma, a Gift of Insights, a Bloodstone Shard, and 250 Crystalline Ingots to create the Gift of Maguuma Mastery.

name: +10% Karma and 10% Experience Banner
description: Spawns a guild banner that will give +10% karma and +10% experience from kills for 30 minutes to any ally that touches it. Does not stack with other karma or experience banners.

name: Tricks and Tips for Advanced Spear Crafting
description: Contains the book "Expertise in Spear Crafting" and recipes for second-tier Carcharias.

name: Orr's Fall
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Manuscript of 'Proposal for a 1:1 Scale Map of Tyria'
Recipe: Svaard's Epaulets
description: A recipe to make ascended light shoulders with Marauder (+Power, +Precision, +Vitality, and +Ferocity) stats.

name: Recipe: Ruka's Breeches
description: A recipe to make ascended light leggings with Wanderer's (+Power, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Toughness) stats.

name: Reaper's Inscription
description: Purchased for crystalline ore at Mordremoth's Vantage in Dragon's Stand after the area has been secured.

details.name: Guild Gathering Boost
details.description: Increase chance to find rare materials from mining, logging, and harvesting by 8%.

name: Laranthir's Vigilant Insignia
description: Used in the crafting of armor with +Power, +Toughness, +Concentration, and +Expertise.

name: Recipe: Vigilant Pearl Crusher
description: A recipe to make a Vigilant Pearl Crusher.

name: Chest of Blooms
description: Contains the Essence of Blooms and recipes for first-tier Leaf of Kudzu.

name: The Anthem of Doom
description: Guild anthem to play during victories or achievements

name: Distilled Essence of Zhaitan
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Expertise in Scepter Crafting
description:
Use this expertise to craft a second-tier precursor.
<c=@flavor>Most informative.<c>

name: Scope
description: Used to craft The Hunter.

name: Laranthir's Striders
description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the Vigil leader, Laranthir of the Wild.</c>

name: Heart of an Ember
description: Dropped by Embers.

name: Sneakthief Nika
description: Consume to unlock this unique Mist Champion skin on your account.

name: Tricks and Tips for Advanced Shield Crafting
description: Contains the book "Expertise in Shield Crafting" and recipes for the second-tier shield The Chosen.

name: Recipe: Viper's Emblazoned Boots
description: A recipe to make Viper's Emblazoned Boots.

name: Thesis on Basic Strength
description: Thesis: Double-click to set out a tome to share with anyone in the area. Stays active for 5 minutes.

details.name: Enhancement
details.description:
Gain 40 Power When Health above 90%
+10% Experience from Kills

name: Balanced Spear Haft
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

description: <c=@flavor>Crafted in the style of the famous minstrel, Maklain.</c>

description: This box contains a mini Nika, dragonite ore, empyreal fragments, obsidian shards, and mystic clovers.

name: Ascalonian Blueprint
description: Used to craft decorations of an older style. Can be found on ghosts.

name: Recipe: Ruka's Wanderer's Insignia
description: A recipe to make an ascended insignia for crafting armor with Wanderer's (+Power, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Toughness) stats.

name: Bag of Aurillium
description: Contains 1 lump of aurillium.

description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Perfected Pistol
description: Salvage this weapon to receive its spirit, needed to craft the next tier of this legendary precursor.

name: Lion's Arch Portal Scroll
description: Double-click to teleport to this city. This item cannot be used while in combat.

name: Kudzu Vol. 2
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

description: Unequip this backpack to use it as a crafting ingredient. Using this as a crafting ingredient will destroy any upgrades it contains.

description: Ingredient

description: Complete the North Wind collection to unlock.

name: Recipe: Exalted Dagger Core
description: Used to craft Auric weapons.

name: Putrid Ichor
description: Use the low-pressure environment of Goemm's Lab high above Metrica Province to safely combine 10 Piles of Bloodstone Dust with Putrid Ichor at a Console to form a Volatile Compound.

name: Recipe: Vigilant Draconic Gauntlets
description: A recipe to make Vigilant Draconic Gauntlets.

name: Mist Offensive Potion
description:
Increases outgoing damage in the Fractals of the Mists. Stacks up to five times.
With Fractal Attunement Mastery, converts a portion of your agony resistance to vitality.
Turn in unwanted potions to Dessa's Alchemist for Fractal Relics.

details.name: Fractal Offensive
details.description: Outgoing damage in fractals is increased by 3% per stack. Outgoing condition damage in fractals is increased by 3% per stack.

name: Recipe: Veldrunner Leather Breather
description: A recipe to make an ascended medium breather with Apothecary (+Healing Power, +Toughness, and +Condition Damage) stats.
